document_data.name: Arvo
document_data.History:
Arvo was born in [[Ravens Bluff]] but went to Chult to study plants.

There, Arvo saved a [[Tabaxi (tribe)|Tabaxi]] tribe dying from a strange disease and they adopted him, deciding to settle near his cave.
document_data.Activities: Arvo lived alone in a large cave and nearby live a Tabaxi tribe devoted to him. He was busy studying the plants of Chult, often traveling far from home to find new examples.
document_data.Personality: Arvo was quiet, brooding, and absorbed in his work. He disliked disruptions to his routine, preferring to remain alone.
